reviews.text:
This is a small railway station out in the middle of nowhere or so it seems that is not easy to get to by car due to the narrow Lanes and roads around the area.

 the car park is quite small and can take up to 3 cars at a time. The railway station does have a bicycle rack which can accommodate 3 bicycles.

There are two platforms one for trains to Crewe and one for  trains to Shrewsbury. Both platforms have a covered shelter area, and the station does have a live departure board as well. This station does not sell railway tickets. One nice little thing was seeing a collection of flower baskets hanging from a nearby building adding a bit of colour to the place.
